TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowMenuCommands extends System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardCommands
Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowMenuCommands Inherits StandardCommands

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義一組 欄位，每一個欄位都對應至工作流程設計工具提供的一個命令函式。

span.span: Defines a set of fields that each corresponds to a command function provided by the workflow designers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 包含一組 欄位，使用 的 方法加入命令時，可以使用這些欄位指定要連結的命令。 contains a set of fields that can be used to specify a command to link when adding a command using the method of the . ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 屬性的 方法，如下列範例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 屬性的 方法，如下列範例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID BreakpointActionMenu
Public Shared ReadOnly BreakpointActionMenu As CommandID

summary.span: 取得中斷點動作功能表的 。

span.span: Gets the for the breakpoint action menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中斷點動作功能表通常用來設定、移除或變更中斷點。The breakpoint action menu is typically used to set, remove, or change breakpoints.

Public Shared ReadOnly BreakpointConditionMenu As CommandID

span.span: Gets the for the breakpoint condition menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中斷點條件功能表通常用來設定、移除或變更條件中斷點。The breakpoint condition menu is typically used to set, remove, or change conditional breakpoints.

Public Shared ReadOnly BreakpointConstraintsMenu As CommandID

summary.span: 取得中斷點條件約束功能表的 。

span.span: Gets the for the breakpoint constraints menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中斷點條件約束功能表通常用來設定、移除或變更中斷點上的條件約束。The breakpoint constraints menu is typically used to set, remove or change constraints on breakpoints.

Public Shared ReadOnly BreakpointHitCountMenu As CommandID

span.span: Gets the for the breakpoint hit count menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中斷點叫用次數功能表通常用來顯示中斷點的叫用次數。The breakpoint hit count menu typically displays the hit count for breakpoints.

Public Shared ReadOnly BreakpointLocationMenu As CommandID

summary.span: 取得中斷點位置功能表的 。

span.span: Gets the for the breakpoint location menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中斷點位置功能表通常用來修改中斷點的位置。The breakpoint location menu is typically used to modify the location of breakpoints.

Public Shared ReadOnly ChangeTheme As CommandID

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主題變更功能表通常用來變更設計工具的主題。The theme change menu is typically used to change the theme for the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID ClearBreakpointsMenu
Public Shared ReadOnly ClearBreakpointsMenu As CommandID

summary.span: ，可用來存取清除中斷點功能表。

span.span: A that can be used to access the clear breakpoints menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除中斷點功能表通常用來清除偵錯工具中的所有中斷點。The clear breakpoints menu is typically used to clear all breakpoints set in the debugger.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID Collapse
Public Shared ReadOnly Collapse As CommandID

span.span: A that can be used to access the collapse menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 摺疊功能表通常用於摺疊複合活動。The collapse menu is typically used to collapse composite activities. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 屬性的 方法，如下列範例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停用功能表通常可停用工作流程中的活動。The disable menu typically disables an activity on a workflow. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 屬性的 方法，如下列範例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. summary.span: ，可用於存取 PageDown 功能表。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下一頁功能表通常用來將工作流程捲動至下一頁。The page down menu is typically used to scroll the workflow down one page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID SelectionMenu
Public Shared ReadOnly SelectionMenu As CommandID

summary.span: 可用於存取選取功能表的 。

span.span: A that can be used to access the selection menu.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取功能表通常用來管理工作流程中的選取。The selection menu is typically used to manage a selection within the workflow. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom . 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called. 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text. 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#44)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#44)] 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 屬性的 方法，如下列範例所示。To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the property in a class as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#31)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#31)]
